verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
Come to the water
Come to the water of life
Come to the water
Come to the water of life

verse.name: o2
verse.lines:
Would you believe me if I said
Youâ€™d never thirst again?
Would you believe me if I said
that you could raise the dead?
